Theme-UI

{`AKA what I have been waiting for...`}

{`About Me`}

  • {`Self-taught `}

What is Theme-UI?
What Theme-UI isn't

{`Theme-UI Is not a CSS in JS Library`}

{`üë©‚Äçüé§üíÑüíÖ`}

{`In fact its built on top of Emotion! üë©‚Äçüé§`}

What Theme-UI is
  • {`Theme-UI is complete library built around creating themeable components. `}
  • {`It provides you a system for creating themes, and components that can be driven by them.`}
What do themes look like? 
{`export default {
  colors: {
    text: '#000',
    background: '#fff',
    primary: '#33e',
  },
  ...
}
`}
Themes can define variants 
{`

`}

{`Defining Variants`}

{`export default {
  buttons: {
    primary: {
      backgroundColor: "primary",
      padding: 4,
      margin: 4
    },
    secondary: {
      backgroundColor: "secondary",
      padding: 2,
      margin: 2
    }
  }
  ...
}
`}
